Lovely Professional University - Online

Punjab

4.5 (127 user ratings)
★★★★★ 4.5/5

Study Mode: Distance

Institution Type : Private

About LPU

Lovely Professional University (LPU) is a top-ranking university in India in various academic
disciplines, ranking by NIRF. LPU Online is no different as it is one of the top online education
providers in India.
The university has various affiliations including recognition from University Grants
Commission (UGC), All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), and World Education
Services (WES). The university has been ranked by NIRF, WURI, and The World University
Ranking 2022. The quality of education this university provides is quite evident from its NAAC
A++ grading.
The university offers online UG and PG courses in the domains of Management, Computer
Applications, Commerce, Arts, and Science. The curriculum for every course in industry
oriented as it has been designed by expert practitioners and experienced faculty. Apart from
academic learning, the university conducts skilling classes conducted by a dedicated team of
in-house professors.
The university has its own Learning Management System (LMS) that can be accessed as a
mobile app which is quite user-friendly and has customized features to ensure students have
a seamless learning experience.
There are live online classes with real with-time interaction between the faculty and students
to offer a structured opportunity to communicate. This is to make sure that online learners
have an innovative classroom experience. However, the live lectures are recorded and made
available for all to access to provide maximum flexibility to the students.
The university regards extra-curricular activities and encourage its online learners to join
community service groups. This not just deviates students from mundane academics but also
allows them to build strong networks and share their innovative thoughts with the
community.

To make education accessible to all, the university has set up the Centre for Distance and Online Education which brings great learning opportunities to students. The centre provides a wholly digital ecosystem for students to flourish.

Furthermore, LPU provides students the chance to participate in campus events, thus encouraging holistic development. It also provides advanced career support services to help students secure a well-paying job.

In order to provide quality higher education to a larger chunk of people, the university has established a Open & Distance Learning and an Online Learning Arm. Both these institutions offer a diverse range of programmes paired with flexibility, experiential learning and interdisciplinary orientation. It allows students to explore their interests and pursue their dream careers. 

In order to make sure that students can reap maximum benefits out of their distance/ online learning experience, the university has in place an advanced learning management system. Students can use it to access study material and track their progress.

Admission Process

The admission procedure at LPU Online takes places in online mode. The fresh admission
batches starts in every 6 months. The admission session generally starts in the month of
January and July of every year. Direct admission is done on the basis of one’s educational
qualification, no other entrance exam are conducted for taking admission. The admission


procedure for the online courses at LPU Online is as follows:


Step 1: First step is registration. You have to sign up and pay a registration fee of INR 500Step 2: Next step is to fill the online application form and upload relevant documents.
Step 3: Now, you have to pay the program fee.
Step 4: The university will verify the documents and notify you for further procedures.
Step 5: Upon approval from the university, you will get your LMS credentials via email.

List of Documents
  • Marksheets
  • Residential Proof
  • Proof of Date of Birth
  • Government Issued ID
  • Photocopy of Disability Certificate/ Employment certificate/ Service proof in case of Defence or Paramilitary forces (if applicable)
  • Undertaking by the applicant in case of any pendency (Result awaited/ Reappear/Backlog or any other pendency)
  • Undertaking for Gap Period (if applicable)
  • Two passport size coloured photographs 
  • Demand Draft (DD) for the prescribed fee
Approvals
  • UGC
  • AICTE
  • AIU
  • NIRF
  • WES
  • NAAC A++
  • SACSCOC

Why LPU

  • LPU Online is approved by UGC-DEB to offer UG and PG degrees in the online mode.
  • The university has its own LMS which can be accessed as a mobile app as well
  • The examinations are conducted in the online mode with remote proctoring using various
    Artificial Intelligence (AI) tools.
  • The student can access exclusive resources like case studies, scholarly articles, and
    journals.
  • Students can take up various additional online certificate courses conducted by the
    university to enhance their resumes
  • The students have the opportunities to undertake research endeavors as the university
    has world-class research facilities and infrastructure for the same.
